section.name: Project Overview
section.p:
This project provides various an api to help resolving environment related properties/variables, by looking in various sources :
org.mevenide.context allows to avoid unnecessary I/O operations by providing a single entry point, subjacent models are shared by the clients
org.mevenide.environment package contains implementations of ILocationFinder used to find relevant properties (such as MAVEN_HOME)
org.mevenide.properties package contains model for property files that keeps trace of comments and elements order
org.mevenide.resolver contains helper classes used to resolve properties, e.g. ${some.property} or $ {pom.build.sourceDirectory}
Please refer to the javadoc and source xref for more informations.
